attributes.action: Make St.George's day  a public holiday in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a day which should be marked in England;by the best tradition, of a public and bank holiday. Allowing the people who love their country of England the chance to take a day to enjoy their homeland.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
